title: Adding the ordinal model into the package
body: including changes in QGparams to call it and in QGparams doc

repo.description: Compute various quantitative genetics parameters from a Generalised Linear Mixed Model (GLMM) estimates. Especially, it yields the observed phenotypic mean, phenotypic variance and additive genetic variance.
repo.name: QGglmm

title: Add error when people are trying to put vectors instead of scalars fo…
body:
…r mu or variances. (#4)

Also, add an example in QGparam help to show how to best "integrate" over a posterior distribution.

title: Multivariate
body:
Major change: Addition of the function QGmvpredict() for multivariate predictions.

Minor changes:
- Some huge improvment on computation time for QGpredict()
- Changed the name of QGmean.obs, QGmvmean.obs and QGvcov.obs -> removed the "obs" part
- Some other minor changes (see commits)
